name: Banana Wall: Split Happens
description:
Get Banana Man through 25 challenging levels by clicking and dragging his limbs to get him to the end of each level.

Made in a month for FZ Game Jam 2021.

The game saves your progress after each level and you can resume where you left off whenever you start the game again.

Controls

Press and hold the Left Mouse Button to select and drag Banana Man's arms, legs and head. Release the button to freeze the selected limb in place.

Press the Right Mouse Button to unfreeze all limbs.
